name: Sling Escape
description:
The map is made up of English alphabets, and you can sling your car and run without going out of the street.

Like the marbles in the squid game, with enough strength to stay on the road,

The key is to sling and fire. Power control is the key.

It is divided into three difficulty levels, and obstacles and obstacles appear according to the difficulty level.

Currently, there are 24 types of cars available, and each car has a different strength.

You'll have to find a car that suits you. 

You can get a car with 100 coins, but it's random, so the car you want...

I don't know if it'll come out.

Coins are common for both re-doing, buying a car, and buying a background.

When all stages are cleared, the next level of difficulty will be opened.

You don't have to get an S grade when you clear it.

Let's become masters of power control. ^^
